thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 24 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Shanxi Zhendong Pharmaceutical sees FY 2017 net profit up 55 pct to 70 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shanxi Zhendong Pharmaceutical sees FY 2017 net profit up 55 pct to 70 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - shanxi zhendong pharmaceutical co ltd

text:
Jan 24(Reuters) - Shanxi Zhendong Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to increase by 55 percent to 70 percent, or to be 314.7 million yuan to 345.2 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 203.1 million yuan
* Says increased income from pharmaceutical unit is the main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/HpSozU
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
